tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QuantumCommunicationData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(50),
    recipient VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT,
    encryption_key VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerData (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  encrypted_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantum_data_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (quantum_data_id) REFERENCES QuantumCommunicationData(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AccessLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  data_accessed INT NOT NULL,
  access_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  encrypted_details VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE encrypted_messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    recipient VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    message_text TEXT,
    encryption_key_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (encryption_key_id) REFERENCES encrypted_quantum_keys(id)
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    log_message TEXT,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    network_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES quantum_devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (network_id) REFERENCES quantum_network(network_id)
);
